message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to offer $1400000 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1750000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $1300000 for the product.
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1600000.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to offer $1250000 for the product.
